name: Texas delivers Pizza
description: Texas' usual delivery routine, but this time a rather annoying lupo joins in

name: Arknights with RTX
description: Enjoy ray-traced graphics for the mobile game Arknights at the cost of probably burning your phone

name: Kroos with a megaphone
description: Testing out her new megaphone, Kroos proceeds to shout at midnight disturbing all the other sleeping operators

name: Sora with a rocket launcher
description: The famous Terran idol now learns how to properly use an RPG-7

name: Penguin Logistics Goes Bankrupt
description: Pays the price of excessive expenses thanks to the team's wanton destruction

name: Arknights with even more RTX
description: Sequel to 'Arknights with RTX', this time with ray-traced reflections and ultra high quality texture for battle maps

name: Arknights Annihilation in 3D
description: A short concept of a 3D Arknights gameplay for the Annihilation Lungmen Downtown stage
